successes.title: Krosmaster Arena Anime Miniatures Game - Frigost Expansion

Pledges.description: SUPPORTER LEVEL - Our thanks, and an online code for the Terminatot Promo for use in the online version of Krosmaster: Arena!
HELPER LEVEL - You'll received the promotional Terminatot figure and online code with free shipping to any USA Domestic address!
STARTER LEVEL - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

COMMANDER LEVEL - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals -  with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

MASTER LEVEL - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND one copy of the Base Game plus 6 extra promo figures AND eligible for all stretch goals - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

COLLECTOR'S EDITION (Count Harebourg XXL) - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals PLUS a set of 18 PVC terrain pieces AND a set of 15 PVC token pieces AND a limited edition XXL Count Harebourg figure AND MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED! - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

COLLECTOR'S EDITION (Argon Gass XXL) - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals PLUS a set of 18 PVC terrain pieces AND a set of 15 PVC token pieces AND a limited edition XXL Argon Gass figure AND MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED! - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

COLLECTOR'S EDITION (Yech'ti XXL) - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals PLUS a set of 18 PVC terrain pieces AND a set of 15 PVC token pieces AND a limited edition XXL Yech'ti figure AND MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED! - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

COLLECTOR'S EDITION (Carrying Case Edition) - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals PLUS a set of 18 PVC terrain pieces AND a set of 15 PVC token pieces AND a limited edition Frigost Carrying Case AND MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED! - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

SUPER COLLECTOR'S EDITION - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals PLUS a set of 38 Resin and/or PVC terrain pieces AND a set of 32 PVC token pieces AND 60 Metallized Kama Coins AND 15 Metallized Gallons of Glory AND a copy of the Base Game and ALL EIGHT original expansions plus ALL EIGHT original promos AND MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED! - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address

SUPER COLLECTOR'S EDITION (the sequel) - One copy of Krosmaster: Arena - Frigost Extension, 1 set of alternative trees and ice cubes, one promo figure Terminatot, AND a copy of the new Duel Pack featuring 2 new figures AND eligible for all stretch goals PLUS a set of 38 Resin and/or PVC terrain pieces AND a set of 32 PVC token pieces AND 60 Metallized Kama Coins AND 15 Metallized Gallons of Glory AND a copy of the Base Game and ALL EIGHT original expansions plus ALL EIGHT original promos AND MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED! - with free shipping to any USA Domestic address
